summary: Added __hash__ method to Todo class to support hashing for use in sets and as dict keys. The __eq__ method is already provided by dataclass decorator.

changes.description: Added __hash__ method based on id field
Added comprehensive tests for __eq__ and __hash__ methods

risks: Hash is based only on id, so two todos with same id but different text/done/timestamps will have same hash but may not be equal (hash collision)
